trans-unit.source: Contains information required to perform schema importation using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> and <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"></xref> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações necessárias para executar a importação de esquema usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>e <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"> </xref> infra-estrutura.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The WrappedOptions is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter> and the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: O WrappedOptions é usado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter>e o [Ferramenta Utilitária de metadados ServiceModel (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter>

trans-unit.source: The WrappedOptions class controls whether special-casing is used for document-literal styled documents with wrapped parameters.
trans-unit.target: Controles de classe as WrappedOptions se maiusculas e minúsculas especial é usada para documento-literal com o estilo de documentos com parâmetros encapsulados.

trans-unit.source: Use the **/wrapped** switch with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](../Topic/ServiceModel%20Metadata%20Utility%20Tool%20\(Svcutil.exe\).md) tool to specify normal casing.
trans-unit.target: Use o **/ encapsulado** alternar com a [Ferramenta Utilitária de metadados ServiceModel (Svcutil.exe)](../Topic/ServiceModel%20Metadata%20Utility%20Tool%20\(Svcutil.exe\).md) ferramenta para especificar o uso de maiusculas e minúsculas normal.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WrappedOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.WrappedOptions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as maiusculas e minúsculas especial é usada para documentos com estilo de literal encapsulado documento quando os parâmetros são desencapsulamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if special-casing is used for document-wrapped-literal styled documents when parameters are unwrapped; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se maiusculas e minúsculas especial é usada para o documento encapsulado-literal com o estilo de documentos quando os parâmetros são desencapsulamento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
